incomesVsSpendings.name: Incomes > Spendings
incomesVsSpendings.description: Your total income should be higher than your total spendings + required payments

positiveBalance.name: Positive Balance
positiveBalance.description: Counting all your savings, budget accounts and debts - your balance should be positive

savings.name: Significant Savings
savings.description: You should have your 3-6 months total expenses in savings. In other words - if you will lost all your sources of income - you should be able to live 3-6 months with no impact on your normal life at all.

investmentAssets.name: Long-term Investment Assets
investmentAssets.description: You should have investment assets with long-term plans with total cost of at least your 3 months income.

insurance.name: Life & Medical Insurance
insurance.description: You should have insurance for medical and life-taking accidents in order to protect yourself and your family from being impacted by health problems.
